DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study use iterative process develop refine skill-based cooking intervention decrease consumption energy food prepare away home evening meal , decrease energy intake , promote healthy weight parent child age 3-10 year .
DOC.brief_title: Skill-based Cooking Intervention Reduce Eating Out
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I . Conduct 2-4 focus group 6-10 caretaker , report eat food prepare away home ≥3 time per week , per group gain insight current eating behavior food prepare away home , current perception home prepare evening meal , barrier prepare even meal home . Information gather Phase I use inform intervention development Phase II . Phase II . Develop , refine , manualize skill-based cooking intervention overweight/obese caretaker child age 3-10 year . The aim Phase II test feasibility skill-based cooking intervention reduce consumption food prepare away home evening meal ( e.g. , pre-prepared frozen food , restaurant food , fast food , take-out ) , energy intake evening meal , promote healthy weight parent child . Information collect Phase I inform development skill-based cooking intervention . Once developed , intervention refine 6 primary caretaker child , meet criterion overweight/obese test phase . Conducting intervention least six family provide opportunity refinement intervention procedure . The result important demonstrate feasibility future pilot randomize control trial test impact skill-based cooking intervention compare standard cooking demonstration recipes simply provided family .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( Phase I ) : ≥18 year age child age 3 10 yearsold report primary caretaker primary feeding responsibility child dinner/supper able read , speak , understand English transportation Medical Center report family include child eats preprepared frozen food , restaurant food , fast food , takeout dinner ≥3 time per week work telephone number able attend schedule date time focus group . Inclusion Criteria ( Phase II ) : caretaker ≥18 year age caretaker overweight obese ( BMI≥25 ) child age 3 10 yearsold report primary caretaker primary feeding responsibility child dinner/supper caretaker able read , speak , understand English transportation medical center instructional kitchen plan move area June 2015 report family include child eats convenience food , restaurant food , fast food , takeout dinner ≥3 time per week report access kitchen able attend schedule date time session . Exclusion Criteria ( Phase II ) : caretaker child currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication medical condition know promote growth ( e.g. , PraderWilli syndrome , Cushing 's syndrome ) gastric bypass surgery .
